description: List organization invoices batch status changes.
permissions: Allowed for users authorized by OrganizationInvoicesBatchStatusChangePolicy. Non-admins can only access status changes for organization invoices batches within their OrganizationInvoicesBatch policy scope (manager membership or broker membership).
validation_notes: Status filter accepts only: not_processed, processed. Multiple filters can be combined; all filters use AND logic.

flags.name: organization-invoices-batch
flags.description: Filter by organization invoices batch ID
